casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Jamarr FOWLER Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 10, 2018

Robert J. McKay, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Timothy F. Costello, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 332, 175 A.3d 76 (2017), is denied.
